eu_initiatives:
AEGE is an association created in 1980 in Spain by 40 industrial groups to represent them in energy topics  
 
•    Basic chemistry, copper, zinc, aluminium, steel, industrial gases, paper, ferroalloys…… 
  
•    11% of the Spanish national consumption of electric power. 
•    10% of the consumption of natural gas 
 
•    More than 75.000 direct employments 
•    Currently we are 26 industrial groups that represent 66.000 direct employments.
organisation_name: ASOCIACIÓN DE EMPRESAS CON GRAN CONSUMO DE ENERGÍA (AEGE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
•    AEGE is an association created in 1980 in Spain by 40 industrial groups to represent them in energy topics  
 
•    Basic chemistry, copper, zinc, aluminium, steel, industrial gases, paper, ferroalloys…… 
  
•    11% of the Spanish national consumption of electric power. 
•    10% of the consumption of natural gas 
 
•    More than 75.000 direct employments 
 
Currently we are 26 industrial groups and 66.000 direct employments.
